item.title: Introduction To C# Programming Language - C# Tutorials For Beginners #1
item.description: C#(C sharp) is a programming language developed by Microsoft. C# runs on .NET Framework. C# is used to develop the following applications and software : Mobile Apps Video Games Desktop Apps Web Apps Graphical User Interface(GUI) Microsoft Visual Studio is one of the best Integrated Development Environment (IDE) and Code Editor for C#. Step 1: Download Visual Studio Installer Now, We will start to download Visual Studio to start programming.
